S_su: Monosaccharides from residual simple sugars; limited due to pre-acidification
S_aa: Amino acids from protein hydrolysis; small soluble fraction
S_fa: Long chain fatty acids from fats/oils; low solubility
S_ac: Acetate dominant VFA; tuned to match COD
S_IC: Inorganic carbon as bicarbonate/CO2 for alkalinity at pH 6.5
S_IN: Inorganic nitrogen as ammonia/ammonium set to match TKN
S_I: Soluble inerts at ~0.6% of COD (food/beverage guideline)
S_cat: Other cations (Na+, Ca2+, K+, Mg2+) excluding NH4+
S_an: Other anions (Cl-, etc.) tuned for electroneutrality at pH 6.5
X_c: Composite particulates grouped into CH/PR/LI to meet VSS
X_li: Particulate lipids from cooking fats and oils
X_I: Particulate inerts; non-volatile solids to approach TSS target
S_IP: Inorganic orthophosphate set to match TP = 500 mg-P/L
S_SO4: Sulfate typical for food-processing wastewater (~50 mg S/L)
S_IS: Total dissolved sulfide kept low to avoid inhibition
